contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Airport | name = Qiemo Airport | nativename-a = {{lang|zh-cn|{{nobold|且末机场}}}} | nativename-r = ''Qiěmò Jīchǎng'' | image = | IATA = IQM | ICAO = ZWCM <center>{{Location map|China Xinjiang|width=220|float=center |caption=|mark=Airplane_silhouette.svg|marksize=10 |label=IQM|position=right |lat_deg=38|lat_min=08|lat_sec=58|lat_dir=N |lon_deg=85|lon_min=31|lon_sec=58|lon_dir=E }}<small>Location of airport in Xinjiang</small></center> | type = Public | owner = | operator = | city-served = [[Qiemo]], [[Xinjiang]], [[China]] | location = <!--only if different--> | elevation-f = 4,108 | elevation-m = 1,252 | coordinates = {{coord|38|08|58|N|085|31|58|E|region:CN_type:airport}} | website = | metric-rwy = y | r1-number = 01/19 | r1-length-m = 1,680 | r1-surface = Asphalt | footnotes = Sources: <ref name="AirfieldMaps">[http://www.airfieldmaps.co.uk/chinaairports.htm Airports in China] from AirfieldMaps.co.uk</ref><ref name="GCM">{{GCM|ZWCM}}</ref><ref>{{ASN|IQM}}</ref> }} '''Qiemo Airport''' ({{lang-zh|且末机场}}) {{airport codes|IQM|ZWCM}} is an [[airport]] serving [[Qiemo Town]] and the rest of [[Qiemo County]], in the [[Bayin'gholin Mongol Autonomous Prefecture]] of the [[Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region]] of the [[People's Republic of China]]. == Facilities == The airport resides at an [[elevation]] of {{convert|4108|ft|0}} above [[mean sea level]]. It has one asphalt paved [[runway]] designated 01/19 which measures {{convert|1680|×|30|m|0}}.<ref name="AirfieldMaps" />{{fact|date=July 2012}}<ref>{{cite web | url = http://www.wikimapia.org/#lat=38.1489688&lon=85.5327272&z=15&l=0&m=b&v=8&gz=0;855310321;381420921;0;0;38195;148157 | title = Annotated aerial image showing length of runway, marked 01/19 | work = WikiMapia | accessdate = 23 Feb 2010}}</ref> ==See also== * [[List of airports in China]] ==References== <references /> [[Category:Airports in Xinjiang]]
